name: AvePoint EduTech
description: In 2001, our founders were busy preparing to bring our first product to market — a backup solution for Microsoft's email service, Exchange. Shortly after, their focus quickly turned to providing a backup solution for a new Microsoft product that offered site-based collaboration: SharePoint 2001. Today, our platform to optimize SaaS operations and secure collaboration is hosted across 14 global datacenters for unmatched scalability, and to support data sovereignty requirements. Our cloud platform is certified against leading security accreditations and boasts one of the largest SaaS userbases in the Microsoft 365 ecosystem. We have pushed the boundaries of enterprise digital collaboration with first-to-market technologies for two decades. More than half of our workforce – including our senior leadership team – are technologists.
features: We value quick, informed decision-making to meet and exceed customer expectations. We subscribe to a growth mindset, which contributes to our entrepreneurial and learning spirit.
Drive and energy are contagious here; we are not just going through the motions. We do things that are impactful and as a result, amplify our customers’ success.

We are invested in the success of our colleagues, partners, customers, and community. We do this by promoting global collaboration and taking pride in helping, sharing, mentoring, and coaching each other.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: Collaborate with confidence
ShortDescription: AvePoint provides the most advanced platform to optimize SaaS operations and secure collaboration. More than 17,000 customers worldwide rely on our solutions to make them more productive, compliant and secure.
enhanced_description: AvePoint EduTech provides a specialized platform focused on accelerating skill development and learning efficiency, leveraging AvePoint's two decades of expertise in optimizing SaaS operations and securing enterprise digital collaboration. Originally known for pioneering backup solutions for Microsoft Exchange and SharePoint, AvePoint's cloud platform now supports over 17,000 customers worldwide. It is hosted across 14 global datacenters, ensuring unmatched scalability and compliance with data sovereignty requirements. The platform is certified against leading security accreditations and is a significant player in the Microsoft 365 ecosystem, empowering organizations to enhance productivity, compliance, and security within their learning and development initiatives through advanced training management systems and learning experience platforms (LXPs).
